attributes.action: use his influence to keep Dodd's Road Post Office in Attleborough open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dodd's Road Post Office in Attleborough Norfolk serves a large immediate cachement area of the town including a significant senior population.

It is efficient, always busy and friendly and a centre for the community - it would be madness to kill off such a brilliant sociial ammenity when it is obviously thriving.

Whilst nobody expects the Post Office system to lose lots of taxpayers money, closing Post Offices like this will drive business away from the Royal Mail and harm the overall economy.
